00053 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 |   PLT_MediaServerDelegate
00055 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 class PLT_MediaServerDelegate
00062 {
00063 public:
00064     PLT_MediaServerDelegate() {}
00065     virtual ~PLT_MediaServerDelegate() {}
00066     
00067     virtual NPT_Result OnBrowseMetadata(PLT_ActionReference&          /*action*/, 
00068                                         const char*                   /*object_id*/, 
00069                                         const char*                   /*filter*/,
00070                                         NPT_UInt32                    /*starting_index*/,
00071                                         NPT_UInt32                    /*requested_count*/,
00072                                         const NPT_List<NPT_String>&   /*sort_criteria*/,
00073                                         const PLT_HttpRequestContext& /*context*/) = 0;
00074     virtual NPT_Result OnBrowseDirectChildren(PLT_ActionReference&          /*action*/, 
00075                                               const char*                   /*object_id*/, 
00076                                               const char*                   /*filter*/,
00077                                               NPT_UInt32                    /*starting_index*/,
00078                                               NPT_UInt32                    /*requested_count*/,
00079                                               const NPT_List<NPT_String>&   /*sort_criteria*/, 
00080                                               const PLT_HttpRequestContext& /*context*/) = 0;
00081     virtual NPT_Result OnSearchContainer(PLT_ActionReference&          /*action*/, 
00082                                          const char*                   /*container_id*/, 
00083                                          const char*                   /*search_criteria*/,
00084                                          const char*                   /*filter*/,
00085                                          NPT_UInt32                    /*starting_index*/,
00086                                          NPT_UInt32                    /*requested_count*/,
00087                                          const NPT_List<NPT_String>&   /*sort_criteria*/, 
00088                                          const PLT_HttpRequestContext& /*context*/) = 0;
00089     virtual NPT_Result ProcessFileRequest(NPT_HttpRequest&              /*request*/,
00090                                           const NPT_HttpRequestContext& /*context*/,
00091                                           NPT_HttpResponse&             /*response*/) = 0;
00092 };

00101 class PLT_MediaServer : public PLT_DeviceHost
00102 {

00107         BROWSEDIRECTCHILDREN
00108     };

00113     // constructor

00119
